entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failure: Static graph-based restore failed with exit code .* but did not log an error. #103526
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorSpanTests test failure #103525
  • Wasm test failure: Tests timed out. Killing driver service #103524
  • Implicit GC.KeepAlive in classes with finalizers #103522
  • Failed to compile /root/helix/work/workitem/e/wasm_build/obj/wasm/for-build/System.Private.CoreLib.dll.bc #103520
  • [API Proposal]: `LazyInitializer.EnsureInitialized` overloads that accept `ref Lock?`. #103516
  • System.Text.Json emits uncompilable code #103515
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SemaphoreSlim.EnterScope #103509
  • Possible mach port leak on MacOS when running multiple tasks over a long time #103507
  • The mask of `shiftAmount` in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 instead of 31 #103506
  • Job "SuperPMI tpdiff windows x86" timeouts #103505
  • [API Proposal]: Console.Write* convenience overloads for span #103500
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM, cannot run or debug after enabling WasmEnableThreads. #103499

Closed

  • Fully unhandled exceptions break debugger with empty stack #103385
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider support for `IEquatable<Uri>` on `System.Uri` #97940
    9.0.0
  • Obsolete ServicePointManager #71836
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Comparison overload to PriorityQueue constructor #103518
  • [API Proposal]: VectorNNN.Create with broadcasting #92299
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a JSON schema exporting component for STJ contracts #102788
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Unhandled must expand intrinsic, throwing PlatformNotSupportedException"' in Checked mode #97272
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Additional cleanup and acceleration of the System.Numerics vector and related types #103527
    area-System.Numerics
  • fix null check to unblock sdk #103523
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Remove use of alloca from getexepath #103517
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Guard remaining IErrorInfo usage under FEATURE_COMINTEROP #103510
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Pass RID to msbuild task #103508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize out write barriers for fields in ref-like structs #103503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ConvertToint64 and ConvertToUInt64 #103502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan #103498
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Add JsonSchemaExporter. #103322
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix paltests build #103519
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix VS issue with unhandled exception on secondary threads #103425
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Array.Initialize for NativeAOT #103521
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch CoreCLR finalizer loop to C# #103501
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Implement ConvertToInt32 and ConvertToUInt32 for double #103436
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Implement IEquatable on Uri #103511
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete ServicePointManager 🎉 #103456
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Expose various new Create and conversion APIs for the Vector types #103462
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Revert "Consolidate <NativeAotSupported definitions (#103273)" #103497
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Implement 'JIT_GetDynamicNonGCStaticBase_SingleAppDomain', 'JIT_GetDynamicGCStaticBase_SingleAppDomain' after PR#99183. #103467
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Delete -fms-extensions from coreclr native build #102834
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Array.Initialize for big MD arrays #103493
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add a line stating that debugger scenario is not yet supported #103491
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • JIT: Consider block weights instead of `BBF_RUN_RARELY` flag in `fgMoveColdBlocks` #103492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update the artifact path for the maui benchmarks app #103483
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2474809 #103348
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix assembly name parser to accommodate non-ASCII UTF8 strings #103475
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Validate generic constraints in ILLink tests #103452
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix the flakiness of new BinaryFormatter tests #103476
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Adding support for open generic types in attributes #103213
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Move targets of hot jumps to create fallthrough post-RPO layout #102927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR #103055
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [breaking change] dotnet format should return a nonzero exit code for unrecognized argument to --diagnostics #41618
  • Conditional compiling dependencies with Preprocessor Directives #41615
  • environment variables with DOTNET_CONTAINER_ or DOTNET_SDK_CONTAINER_ prefix #41609

Closed

  • Binding Redirect issue in Mac #2171
    Discussion
  • Tab-completion is expected to exhibit "starts with" semantics, instead of "contains" #9244
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn 4.10.0 does not compile for .NET 6 #74016

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35014.68 #74017
  • Test Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer.UnitTests.DocumentChanges.DocumentChangesTests.FindReferencesInChangingDocument(mutatingLspWorkspace: False) failed in CI #74009

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not offer to add default switch case when it handles `null` and an underlying value #74018
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix find refs doing too much work lookign for types that had an alias to them in one file. #74015
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix flakiness in LSP references tests due to non-deterministic ordering #74014
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JS interop with event named "close" breaks Blazor 8.0 event handling #56255
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56254
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56253
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json_spring, mapaction #56252
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #56251
  • Why @ref or ElementReference always has a value after first set value into it and when it does not rendered throw an exception? #56250
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56249
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #56248
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring, mapaction, plaintext #56247

Closed

  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55789
    9.0-preview6
  • Optimize file delivery for web apps #52824
    9.0-preview6
  • [Static Web Assets] Define mechanism to fingerprint an asset relative path and generate new endpoints for it. #54874
    9.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Runtime APIs to support fingerprinting #56076
    9.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56230
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, mapaction #56229
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #56228

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Improve E2E tests performance #56127
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Move Weather page to the Blazor Web Client project when using WebAssembly-based interactivity #55877
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56244
    area-infrastructure
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Counter generated from System.Diagnostic.Metrics resets to zero. #4741

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please have a look at this issue https://github.com/CommunityToolkit/Maui/issues/1931 and how that can be solved. Looks like this fix does some strange things when the Unloaded event is not set on the page and Loaded is. #23080
  • Merging ResourceDictionary from referenced assembly fails to compile [reason found] #23079
  • [.NET 9.0 Preview 5] Could not load file or assembly NuGet.ProjectModel #23078
  • [Android] SwipeItem IconImageSource should allow more configuration #23074

Closed

  • Grouped CollectionView fires IndexOutOfBoundsException from MauiRecyclerView after second collapse/expand #23068
  • OOTB MSIX packaging fails to include Windows SDK #22838
  • Add Maui 8.0.60 to list of Versions (etc) #23059

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure the main branch is using .NET 8 SDK #23077
  • Title not updated after OnAppearing for TabbedPage - fix #23076
    community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨

Merged

  • Add SR6 to issue template #23071

Updated

  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window
  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    community ✨
  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
    area-image
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server translation of strings in where expressions into parameters #34000
  • Cosmos: rework expressions around scalar/structural types #33999
    Backlog
  • Relational: Consider generating "missing ordering" warning for FirstOrDefault/SingleOrDefault with predicate #33997

Closed

  • Add-Migration failing with new Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces v4.10.0 #33970
  • Cosmos: Support aggregate operators #16146
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Allow terminating operators after Skip and Take #24571
    Backlog
  • Non-generic ValueComparer and ValueConverter #33952
  • c# ef core migration generate programatically #33926
  • NET single powerful standard #33923
  • Audit login / logout entries wrap every query in SQL Server Profiler log #33900
  • .Net MAUI App sql Connection for edmx #33863
  • Sensitive data exception logging #33823
  • Issue in documentation #33818
  • DateTime.MaxValue Exceeds Supported Timestamp Bounds #33798
  • use DefaultBoolean, DefaultInt and similar for distinguishing between nullable primitive type and non-nullable with default DB constraint #33729
  • Update Azure.Identity #33668
  • "entityframeworkcore.design" domain is taken and redirect to NSFW contents #32590
  • Storing Same Owned Entity In Json Column Does Not Work #33967
  • Query generated when filtering against a nullable owned type property isn't correct #33504
    7.0.14
  • Execution order of deletes on related tables #33990

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos querying over arrays of structural type #33998
  • Generate Accessors for shadow properties and columns #33996

Merged

  • Support ReadItem for no-tracking queries #33927
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33973
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Support vector search on Cosmos DB #33991
    blocked
